If you do not see our message in the INBOX folder after several attempts, please try:
 1. Check the SPAM folder in your email. Messages could be considered as spam in rare cases.

 2. Please ensure your email address is %1$s

 3. Click "Resend code" after 30 seconds. If you still have not received the code, please contact our Support Team at support@coindepo.com

Verification Profile Security Referrals Bonuses Help Center Log Out
Portfolio Balance The Portfolio Balance represents the current USD/EUR/GBP value of all assets in your Interest Accounts and is for informational purposes only. Actual account balances are denominated in stablecoins and cryptocurrencies. Available to Withdraw The amount available for withdrawal may differ from the Portfolio Balance in three cases: 
1) You have already initiated a withdrawal from one or more of your Interest Accounts and it is in the "Pending" status. Until processing is completed, this amount is included in the Portfolio Balance; and/or
2) The Portfolio Balance includes bonuses that are not available for withdrawal during a certain period, based on the terms of the promotion under which they were received; and/or 
3) Part of the Portfolio Balance is not available for withdrawal, as it is used as collateral to maintain the level of 50% LTV (Loan-to-Value) ratio for loans you have already received, along with accrued interest for using the loan. Total Interest Paid Total Interest Paid represents the current USD/EUR/GBP value of all interest payments that have been made to your Interest Accounts to date. The USD/EUR/GBP value is for informational purposes only. As you may be earning interest in various assets, actual account balances are denominated in stablecoins and cryptocurrencies. Total Interest Accrued Total Interest Accrued represents the current USD/EUR/GBP value of all expected interest payments to your accounts on the next Payout Dates. Actual interest payments are made in stablecoins and cryptocurrencies, so the USD/EUR/GBP value may differ based on the exchange rate on the Payout Date. Token Portfolio Balance The Token Portfolio Balance represents the current USD/EUR/GBP value of all tokens in your Rewards Accounts and is for informational purposes only. Actual account balances are denominated in tokens. The amount available for withdrawal may differ from the Token Portfolio Balance in two cases:
1) Part of the Token Portfolio Balance is not available for withdrawal, as it is locked for a certain period, based on the conditions of the Private Sale/Pre-sale/Promotion/Airdrop of tokens; and/or
2) You have already initiated a withdrawal of tokens from one or more of your Rewards Accounts and it is in the "Pending" status. Until processing is completed, this amount is included in the Token Portfolio Balance." Total Rewards Paid Total Rewards Paid represents the current USD/EUR/GBP value of all interest rewards payments that have been made to your Rewards Accounts to date. The USD/EUR/GBP value is for informational purposes only. As you may be earning rewards in various tokens, actual account balances are denominated in these tokens. Total Rewards Accrued Total Rewards Accrued represents the current USD/EUR/GBP value of all expected interest rewards payments to your accounts on the next Payout Dates. Actual rewards payments are made in tokens, so the USD/EUR/GBP value may differ based on the exchange rate on the Payout Date. Credit Line Limit Your Credit Line Limit is always 50% of the current value of your Available Portfolio Balance (Portfolio Balance minus the sum of all withdrawals in "Pending" status). You can receive loans in stablecoins or cryptocurrency to your Current Interest Account at any time within the Available Credit Limit. Transferring your assets to a collateral account is not required to obtain a loan. You will continue to earn interest as all of your assets will remain in Interest Accounts. Available Credit Limit Your Available Credit Limit is the difference between your Credit Line Limit and the amount of your Current Loans. At the moment, you can get an instant loan in stablecoins or cryptocurrency for an amount not exceeding the Available Credit Limit. Show empty Hide empty Balance Price/24hr Change Interest Paid Interest Paid represents the amount of all interest payments that have been made to your account to date. The displayed current value in USD/EUR/GBP is for informational purposes only. Buy Total value of your assets Stablecoins Gold Crypto
%1$s Deposit Current Interest Account Balance *Once you deposit funds to your Current Interest Account, you can instantly transfer them to any of your %1$s Interest Accounts using the "Transfer Between Accounts" function. Deposit Address WARNING! Please enter both Deposit Address and Tag/MEMO, which are required to deposit %1$s to your CoinDepo account successfully. Tag/MEMO Deposit Rules Send only %1$s to this deposit address using the %2$s network. Sending other asset to this address may result in the total loss of your funds.
Close Account Are you sure you want to close this Interest Account? You can perform this action only with a zero account balance.

Please, first withdraw all funds from the Interest Account you want to close using the "Withdraw" or "Transfer Between Accounts" function.

After that, the Interest Account will be automatically closed. I understand Interest Accounts Accrued Interest Accrued Interest represents the amount of the expected interest payment to your account on the next Interest Payout Date below at 14:00 UTC. The displayed current value in USD/EUR/GBP is for informational purposes only. Interest Payout Date This is the next date the Accrued Interest is paid to the account. When the specified date comes, at 14:00 UTC, the Accrued Interest is credited to the account, and the date is automatically changed to the next one. The Account Balance is increased by the amount of the interest paid. The Accrued Interest amount in the next compounding period also increases, as it is calculated based on the updated Account Balance. Compound interest is paid out every %1$s days Interest Account Rules Add New Account Select Interest Account Type %1$s: %1$s% APR Compound interest is paid out every %1$s days Current (Daily) Weekly Monthly Quarterly Semi-Annual Annual
